imdb.plot outline: Join Poplio and his many friends as they have awesome adventures. Watch as Poplio and Chespin go through time in "The Time Machine" and see Poplio, Charmander and Unbreon get buried alive in "Buried Alive" and watch Pikachu break Poplio's PS4 in "Pikachu's Accident", So much more awaits in The Poplio N' Bros Show.
imdb.title: The Poplio N' Bros Show
akas: The Poplio N' Bros Show (United States)
plot: Join Poplio and his many friends as they have awesome adventures. Watch as Poplio and Chespin go through time in "The Time Machine" and see Poplio, Charmander and Unbreon get buried alive in "Buried Alive" and watch Pikachu break Poplio's PS4 in "Pikachu's Accident", So much more awaits in _The Poplio N' Bros Show_ (qv).::Jordenn Valle Gearhart
